Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.

Features: ? Large private backyard ? King + two queen-sized bedrooms ? 2 full baths ? Backyard access from one bedroom ? Sunny living room ? Separate kitchen with stainless steel appliances ? Hardwood floors throughout ? Bonus nook for desk or reading
Great layout, great location?reach out to tour!

Charming 2 Bedroom in Woodhaven
This well-kept 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is nestled in a peaceful two-family house on a quiet residential block. Enjoy a comfortable layout, great natural light, and easy access to nearby shops, transit, and major roadways.
Highlights: ? Bright and spacious bedrooms ? Full bathroom ? Quiet neighborhood feel ? Convenient access to trains, buses, and highways ? Located in a two-family home
Application fee applies. Contact us to schedule a tour!

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.

details.description:
Discover the perfect blend of space and convenience in this stunning, no-fee duplex apartment, just steps from some of Brooklyn?s most iconic landmarks. Located blocks from the Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Prospect Park, this 3-bedroom plus office space offers both comfort and a prime location.
Key Features:
Spacious queen-size bedrooms, perfect for ample furniture. A bright and airy layout with lots of windows. 1.5 well-appointed bathrooms for added convenience. Generous living space ideal for entertaining or relaxation. A modern kitchen with plenty of cabinet space for all your culinary needs.
Nestled in a vibrant neighborhood, you?ll be just a short walk from great shopping, cozy coffee shops, and a host of dining options. With easy access to the 2, 3, 4, and 5 trains, commuting is a breeze. This is Brooklyn living at its finest?schedule your viewing today!

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

Elevated Waterfront Living in Greenpoint ? Studios to 3-Bedroom Penthouses
Experience the best of Brooklyn on the Greenpoint waterfront, just moments from Williamsburg. This premier rental building offers a collection of beautifully crafted residences, from stylish studios to expansive three-bedroom penthouses?many with private outdoor spaces and breathtaking views of the East River and Manhattan skyline.
Every home features elegant modern finishes, high-end appliances, and the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer, blending luxury with everyday comfort.
Residents enjoy an impressive array of amenities, including: ? Cutting-edge fitness center ? Coworking and resident lounge ? Game room ? Rooftop terrace with panoramic views
Where design meets convenience, and the city is at your doorstep?discover waterfront living reimagined.

Step into this massive 4-bedroom, 4-full-bathroom charmer, boasting exposed brick walls and stunning woodwork throughout!
Features:
- Expansive bedrooms, each fitting a king-size bed and additional furniture with ease - 4 full bathrooms, providing ample space and convenience - Charming exposed brick walls and beautiful woodwork on walls and ceiling - Additional 3 rooms in the basement, perfect for: ? Home offices ? Living spaces ? Creative studios Backyard
- Prime location, just 1 block from the J-M-Z train lines - Bordering East Williamsburg and Bushwick, with Bushwick Avenue just 2 blocks away - Endless shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your doorstep
This incredible property offers unparalleled space, character, and convenience. Perfect for roommates, or entrepreneurs seeking a unique living experience. Schedule a viewing today and make it yours!

Welcome to 372 Kosciuszko, where industrial charm meets modern convenience in one of Brooklyn?s most vibrant neighborhoods. This spacious and stylish 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home features an open-concept layout with bedrooms at opposite ends?perfect for privacy and comfort. Enjoy hardwood floors throughout, oversized windows, and a sleek full bathroom.
The Apartment ? Two large, sun-filled bedrooms ? Open-concept living and dining area ? Full modern bathroom ? Hardwood floors throughout ? Pet-friendly
The Building A former factory reimagined as an upscale residential hub, 372 Kosciuszko offers top-notch amenities, all included at no extra charge: ? Fully equipped fitness center ? Yoga/dance studio ? Lounge with pool table and big-screen TV ? Studio/meditation room ? In-house laundry ? Rooftop with panoramic skyline views ? Theater room ? Secure bike storage ? Elevator, live-in super, and a welcoming, artistic community
Prime Location Surrounded by hip cafes, bars, parks, and top schools?including Pratt Institute?this location offers an unbeatable urban lifestyle. ? 93 WalkScore, 97 TransitScore, 80 BikeScore ? Easy access to the G/J/M trains and B43/B38 buses ? Quick commute to Williamsburg, Downtown Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Long Island City
Don't miss this opportunity to live in a building where character, community, and convenience come together.

details.description:
Welcome to a residence that combines modern luxury with the timeless charm of Prospect Lefferts Gardens, one of Brooklyn?s most historic neighborhoods.
Located only blocks from Prospect park Near Kings County Hospital
This is a gorgeous lux building offering modern features and a sweet lux vibe. The unit offers 3 beautiful bedrooms with a closet, xl windows, chandelier and remote controlled internal heat and A/C. Stainless steel kitchen with full appliances, microwave, dishwasher, large cabinets; Cozy living room with bluetooth speakers and hardwood floors, energy-efficient internal heat and A/C in each room and a beautiful bathroom with a bathtub. Balcony! and this is a treasure to have ;)
ONE YEAR MINIMUM LEASE
The building is a beautiful space offering designer features, beautiful neat hallways and great 24/7 amenities, there is no amenities fee!
- Large complete top-floor gym - Yoga room - Relaxation room - Laundry room - Bike room - Lounge with beautiful resting areas, wifi internet, tv with cable and a pool table and outdoor space - Private parking (Extra charge) - 2 great city view furnished rooftops
Just minutes away and only blocks to Prospect Park, offering ample opportunities for outdoor recreation, leisurely strolls, and a peaceful retreat from city life. The location is very convenient for professionals as it has a very easy and fast access to the city. It is also Ideally located near Kings County Hospital, the neighborhood is a hub for healthcare professionals and staff fostering a vibrant and welcoming community of doctors. The area?s multicultural roots shine through in its eclectic mix of local restaurants, cafes, and shops along Flatbush and Nostrand Avenues. Perfect Location and easy transportation! Enjoy quick and easy access to downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan in less than 30 minutes with nearby B, Q, 2, and 5 subway lines, ensuring a seamless connection to the city.
